timeline.message: Enlist for reflection reactive entity classes

timeline.author: machi1990

replies.bodyText:
I copied them for the implementation of the impertive version.
this method is really big and complex so the comments help me to maintain it yes ...
replies.author: loicmathieu

replies.bodyText: I personally do not see if they add any value.. upon arriving here the loop tells me that an iteration is going on..same for the one below about reflection registration.
replies.author: machi1990

replies.bodyText: While I also don't think this particular comment adds much value, I think it's way overkill to ask people to put less comments. In general comments are good and should be encouraged.
replies.author: FroMage
